ending.1: Although you're sure to lose in the long run, in the short term it's possible (and even probable) that you'll win several times during a single round.
ending.2: Theoretically, if you roll 25 times, there's a 50/50 chance that you'll hit boxcars once in that span.
ending.3: Want to try it? Roll 25 times per table and you should win at half of the them.
